remarks: Dirac bra-ket associative law ` ( <. A | B >. ) <. C | = ` ` <. A | ( | B >. ` ` <. C | ) ` i.e. the juxtaposition of an inner product with a bra equals a ket juxtaposed with an outer product. (Contributed by NM, 23-May-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: kbass2 $p |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H /\ C e. ~H ) -> ( ( ( bra ` A ) ` B ) .fn ( bra ` C ) ) = ( ( bra ` A ) o. ( B ketbra C ) ) ) $.
